name: Predictive Analytics with Apache Spark in Azure HDInsight
tagline: Course files for Predictive Analaytics with Spark in HDInsight Course
body:
![Predictive Analytics with Apache Spark in Azure HDInsight]
(https://www.edx.org/sites/default/files/styles/course_video_banner/public/course/image/featured-card/dat202.3x-about_page_image-318x210.jpg)

***

In this four-week course, youâ€™ll learn how to implement predictive analytics solutions using Spark in Microsoft Azure HDInsight. You'll explore techniques for preparing data, performing feature selection and engineering, and using Spark ML to create machine learning models that operate on static and streaming data.

To take this free course, register in [edX](https://prod-edx-mktg-edit.edx.org/course/implementing-predictive-solutions-spark-microsoft-dat202-3x). You can also view the demos in [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL3t0kfv-X1coySx49ryhFMnWo2lyfekLL).
